problem.markdown:
>> Molecular vibration requires: () high energy radiation () low-energy radiation () least energy radiation (x) gamma radiation
>> The IR spectrum is usually given as: () Hertz (x) Wavenumber () Frequency () Option a and b
>> The relation between the wavenumber and the wavelenght is: (x) Wavenumber = 1 / wavelength in centimeters () Wavenumber = 100 / wavelength in nanometers () Wavelength in nanometers = 1 / wavenumber () not related
>> The IR measurements are given in wavenumber (cm-1) rather than wavelength because: () wavelength measured in centimeters are too large area to scan () wavelength measured in centimeters are large value to read and interpret (x) wavelength measured in micrometers are very small value to read and interpret () wavelength measured in micrometers are too large area to scan
>> Which of the following is not an IR vibrational mode: () stretching () scissoring () rocking (x) rolling
>> Which among the following requires the most energy? (x) asymmetric stretch () wag and twist () asymmetric bend () symmetric bend
>> A typical IR spectrum can be divided into two regions 600 to 1400cm-1 (right portion) and 1400 to 4000cm-1 left portion) , the right portion of the spectrum is called () right region () funtional group region (x) finger print region () vibrational region
>> Which of the foloowing amines show two spikes for the N-H streching? () Primary amines ()x Secondary amines () Tertiary amines () All the above
>> The O-H group in alcohol and carboxylic acids show at: () At the same region around 3000cm-1 () alcohol at 3300cm-1 and carboxylic acid at 3000cm-1 (x) alcohol at 3000cm-1 and carboxylic acid at 3300cm-1 () Cannot say
>> While handling the salt plates it is important not to use bare hands because: () The moisture from the hand would affect the salt plates and the spectrum () The solvents used are often carcinogenic. () The oils and dirt on your fingers will affect your spectrum. (x) All of the above.
problem.p: >> The IR spectrum is usually given as:
>> The relation between the wavenumber and the wavelenght is:
>> The IR measurements are given in wavenumber (cm-1) rather than wavelength because:

choicegroup.choice: wavelength measured in centimeters are too large area to scan
wavelength measured in centimeters are large value to read and interpret
wavelength measured in micrometers are very small value to read and interpret
wavelength measured in micrometers are too large area to scan

problem.p: >> Which of the following is not an IR vibrational mode:
>> Which among the following requires the most energy?
>> A typical IR spectrum can be divided into two regions 600 to 1400cm-1 (right portion) and 1400 to 4000cm-1 left portion) , the right portion of the spectrum is called
>> Which of the foloowing amines show two spikes for the N-H streching?
>> The O-H group in alcohol and carboxylic acids show at:

choicegroup.choice: alcohol at 3300cm-1 and carboxylic acid at 3000cm-1
alcohol at 3000cm-1 and carboxylic acid at 3300cm-1

problem.p: >> While handling the salt plates it is important not to use bare hands because:

choicegroup.choice: The moisture from the hand would affect the salt plates and the spectrum
The solvents used are often carcinogenic.
The oils and dirt on your fingers will affect your spectrum.
